coalda.vis
Class InformationControl

java.lang.Object
  FocusControl
      coalda.vis.InformationControl

public class InformationControl
extends FocusControl

Author:
kesslewd Dispays information about a node, the associated feature vectors and the text, when a user clicks on a node.
